channel.title: [Delta] Delta++
channel.description:
Instead of calling it Delta Cleaned I'll call it Delta++ because it sounds better.
NOTE: since this is a cleaned version of my F2P remake, this mostly only has F2P content. Also, this works different then other Delta's.
This release has probably abit more content (not insanely much ofcourse)
Features: *VERY clean process() method (About 90% is removed/turned into tasks) *Melee/Ranging system from scratch (needs some cleaning, probably has a few bugs) NOTE: F2P features only. (Maybe later I'll release a tutorial to add special attacks) *A second dialogue system (An interface to handle the dialogues of each npc), however, you can still use the regular one *Crafting: Amulet stringing, Gem cutting, Pottery, wool spinning *Single and Double doors (credits to Killamess) *Water Fillables *Floor making *Travelling *Pickables *Ladder system, more can be added easely *Added quite some npc drops *Almost all F2P music *Item Requirements are now loaded though a txt file instead of huge if-else statements (only f2p items yet.) *Item equiping slots are now checked by name instead of putting every item in the correct slot array *Clipping system *Some more basic things.
Media: [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/4lghsw.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/4uv3n5.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/dqr9l2.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/ams1s0.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/25jcmtc.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/ru2lft.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2807ek0.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2j5ki0i.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/23j09wy.png[/img]
I will most likely release some more content for this very soon.
Download link: [url=http://up.ht/17rppWf]http://up.ht/17rppWf[/url]
Client: [url=http://up.ht/ZVnetm]http://up.ht/ZVnetm[/url]
Credits: Killamess - door system J-Dog of r-s (his Delta Cleaned v1.5, the base of this server)
Enjoy.

item.title: [Delta] Delta++
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:48, topic:461399”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=564336.msg4148217#msg4148217 date=1352303135]
I see that you’ve cleaned it, but what else did you do?

Are you still using that horrid ‘process’ class I see in every delta that completes a server cycle, which by the way does it in 500ms (which is wrong)
Did you get rid of that huge fucking switch statement that loads packets and use an array instead
Anything regarding networking?

Just curious
[/quote]

I believe in this version it uses the ‘Process’ class, in Delta Cleaned 2.0 I used the task scheduler for it instead, but I wasn’t sure what was better, so i putted the Process class back in.

And no this does not use switch statement for packets.

And unfortunately this still uses the same networking.[/quote]
thanks for answering. Great job.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Delta++
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:47, topic:461399”]I see that you’ve cleaned it, but what else did you do?

Are you still using that horrid ‘process’ class I see in every delta that completes a server cycle, which by the way does it in 500ms (which is wrong)
Did you get rid of that huge fucking switch statement that loads packets and use an array instead
Anything regarding networking?

Just curious[/quote]

I believe in this version it uses the ‘Process’ class, in Delta Cleaned 2.0 I used the task scheduler for it instead, but I wasn’t sure what was better, so i putted the Process class back in.

And no this does not use switch statement for packets.

And unfortunately this still uses the same networking.
